sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react" import "./style.css" import Breadcrumb from "../components/common/breadcrumb" import axios from "axios" import cookie from "js-cookie" function Detail(props) { const userData = { area: "", average: "", en_except: "", en_explain: "", en_include: "", en_name: "", en_plan: "", en_start_info: "", guide_no: "", lang: "", price: [], product_no: "", registered: "", rep_image: "", status: "", style: "", transportation: "", type: "", updated: "", zh_except: "", zh_explain: "", zh_include: "", zh_name: "", zh_plan: "", zh_start_info: "", preview: [] } const [productInfo, setProductInfo] = useState(userData) useEffect(() => { let form = new FormData() const product_no = props.match.params.id form.append("product_no", product_no) console.log(product_no) axios .post("/api/v1/product/detail", form, { headers: { Authorization: cookie.get("token") } }) .then(response => { setProductInfo({ ...response.data.data.product }) }) }, []) return ( <> {console.log(setProductInfo)}
{/* */}
